me.choco.locksecurity.utils.general

Class UpdateChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.choco.locksecurity.utils.general.UpdateChecker

  • public class UpdateChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to assist in update checks through the use of SpiGet
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateChecker

        public UpdateChecker(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                     java.lang.String pluginName)
        Construct a new UpdateChecker. The update check will not execute until queryUpdateCheck() is invoked.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin to check
        pluginName - the plugin id (found on Spigot)

      • UpdateChecker

        Construct a new UpdateChecker. The update check will not execute until queryUpdateCheck() is invoked.
        Parameters:

        pluginID - the plugin id (found on Spigot)

      • queryUpdateCheck

        public boolean queryUpdateCheck()
        Query an update to the http://www.spiget.org website to retrieve new version information
        Returns:
        true if the query was successfully

      • requiresUpdate

        public boolean requiresUpdate()
        Check whether an update is required or not
        Returns:
        true if an update is required
